instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Force Dark Mode by default. Add 'dark' class to html/body.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid for the Dashboard. Active Spells (Tasks) take center stage (col-span-2), Stats on the left (col-span-1), Leaderboard on the right (col-span-1).
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove default white backgrounds. Use the 'glassmorphism' classes defined above.
5. MOTION: Add 'AnimatePresence' to the Spell List. When a spell is cast (task done), it should dissolve with a particle effect (use simple CSS or framer-motion layoutId).
6. BACKGROUND: Apply the noise texture to the body background to avoid 'flat digital' look.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute (e.g., 'cast-spell-btn', 'login-submit').
